# Reporting Bugs

Found a bug? Help us squash it! Follow these steps to report an issue:

<br>

---

### 1. Search Existing Issues

Check the [Issue Tracker](https://github.com/EGorsel/mendix-userlib-cleanup/issues) to see if the bug has already been reported.

<br>

### 2. Use the Template

If it's a new bug, open a new issue using the **Bug Report** template.

<br>

### 3. Be Descriptive ###

- Mention your **Mendix Studio Pro version**.
- Explain the bug in a clear and concise summary.
- Specify the **engine script** after executing 

        mx--cleanuserlib` command
- Include error logs or screenshots.

<br>

---

<br>

Thank you for helping us make this tool more stable and reliable!
